channel.title: Double HP hits [PI]
channel.description:
This is extremely tricky for me, and maybe one of the most trickiest things on mopar.. But whenever you do something PvP related on my server it doubles the hits. ONLY in PvP and my corporal beast. I don't know whats wrong with it. Whenever someone hits a 2 they hit a 4, when they hit a 60 they hit a 120. Its complicated...
It wasn't like this when I downloaded the source though (BrokenX V1), it was perfectly fine then. Now it just doubles everything and I just don't get it. Could it be the x10 hits or something? There not adding up correctly? I just don't know what it is. If anyone could help me with I would be GREATLY appreciative. :).
Or is because some of my armor is a little overpowered? And now it screwed up all the hits?

item.title: Double HP hits [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Chaotic-Scape Chaotic-Scape
item.description:
@Chaotic-Scape wrote:

Yep, I had someone fix it for me. And that was the problem. It was because I had deal damge twice. Instead of just once.

Read full topic

item.title: Double HP hits [PI]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

It’s your spirit shield effects, they fuck up combat.

Read full topic

item.title: Double HP hits [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sir_bloodhound sir bloodhound
item.description:
@sir_bloodhound wrote:

start looking at your coding to see if there is anything like x2 or in your player files, go just go back through any tuts or coding you have done

Read full topic

item.description:
@Chaotic-Scape wrote:

Didn’t work. Anything else?

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Redownload your CombatAssistant and just replace it with your copy.
